column4: I can't get either of ralink 2500 cards (usb&pci) to work... I followed the guides... help? please?
why not ? donT' they have a windows driver ?
no, I can't get it into the box

put the install cd in ,  you should get a msg asking if you want to use it as  a repos ,  say yes,  then you can install ndiswrapper from apt-get / synaptic  if that doesn't work,  browse the install cd,  under  /pool/man/N
the only way to get a net connection is via the wifi cards which aren't working
ndiswrapper in on the install cd,  you don'T need to get it over the internet
I do need the windows drivers
the cd that came with the card ?
that might work.. how would I extract the drivers off the EXE though?
how are you getting on the internet atm ?  can't you get the drivers from the intenet and then transfer then to linux using eitehr a fat32 partiton or a flash driver or something ?
you might be able to extract the .exe with the archive manager in ubuntu but I am not srue
I use it on another box which does have linux.. no way to move the data though
I'm sure you can figure something out , I 'm hoping that you are a resourcefull individual
